mapper.select: SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, e.name AS exerciseName, t.sets_target AS setsTarget, t.reps_target AS repsTarget, t.calories_target AS caloriesTarget, t.is_completed AS isCompleted FROM todos t JOIN exercises e ON t.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE t.date = #{date} ORDER BY t.todo_id ASC;
